item.caption: Telephone Encounter - RANDI B SILLER - 02/17/2025 4:43 PM CST

content.content:
Formatting of this note is different from the original.
Reviewed Ms. Dooley's labs. We are following her CBC every 3 months. CBC is stable. No changes. We will follow up with repeat labs and a BMBx in 5/2024.
I called Ms. Dooley and reviewed with her.
Latest Reference Range & Units 02/17/25 11:52
WBC 4.1 - 10.5 K/uL 8.3
RBC 3.99 - 5.46 M/uL 4.04
Hgb 12.2 - 15.3 g/dL 11.8 (L)

MCV 82 - 99 fL 87

RDW-CV 11.6 - 15.5 % 12.2
RDW-SD 37.5 - 49.7 fL 39.4

MPV 9.1 - 12.6 fL 8.3 (L)
